summary: A retex for Linwe\'s Armor if it came straight out of the guild.  Since each assassin had their own look, this is not to resemble Altair or Ezio.  Just a spin on Linwes Armor
descriptionHtml:
A retex for Linwe\'s Armor if it came straight out of the guild.  Since each assassin had their own look, this is not to resemble Altair or Ezio.  Just a spin on Linwes Armor

Install: Drop in Data Folder
Linwe armor and hood
Elven gauntlets and boots
author: Handski
